invocations.description: Sets the name for the script to text for appearance when active. To prevent a script from being listed, invoke it as follows: listas('dontlist').
invocations.ex:
auto(200)
listas('Anti-Poison script on standby')
if $poisoned then
	listas('Casting "Antidote Spell"')
	cast('exana pox')
end
invocations.exDescription: Will set the 'list as' text to show what the script is doing in each step.
